project_description: A simple Flutter app with a login screen and a home screen using the Cubit pattern for state management.
architecture_overview: The project is structured using the Cubit pattern for state management. It includes a login screen and a home screen. The state is managed by Cubits, and data models are used to represent the user's information.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: The main entry point of the application. It sets up the Cubit providers and initializes the app.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function of the application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main widget of the application.

files.name: lib/cubits/login_cubit.dart
files.description: Cubit class for managing the login state.

files.name: lib/cubits/logout_cubit.dart
files.description: Cubit class for managing the logout state.

files.name: lib/widgets/login_form.dart
files.description: Form widget for the login screen.

widgets.name: LoginForm
widgets.description: Form widget for the login screen.

cubits.name: LoginCubit
cubits.description: Cubit for managing the login state.

cubits.name: LogoutCubit
cubits.description: Cubit for managing the logout state.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

dependencies.name: bloc_test
dependencies.purpose: Testing utilities for Cubit and Bloc.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant LoginScreen
participant LoginCubit
participant HomeScreen
User -> LoginScreen: Enters Email and Password
LoginScreen -> LoginCubit: Calls login
LoginCubit -> LoginCubit: Validates Credentials
LoginCubit -> HomeScreen: Navigates to HomeScreen
User -> HomeScreen: Clicks Logout
HomeScreen -> LogoutCubit: Calls logout
LogoutCubit -> LoginScreen: Navigates to LoginScreen
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using Cubits. The LoginCubit manages the login state and handles the login process. The LogoutCubit manages the logout state and handles the logout process. The states are updated and reflected in the UI through the use of Flutter Bloc.
navigation_flow: The app starts at the LoginScreen. After a successful login, it navigates to the HomeScreen. From the HomeScreen, the user can log out and navigate back to the LoginScreen.

pubspec_yaml.name: my_flutter_app
pubspec_yaml.description: A simple Flutter app with a login screen and a home screen using the Cubit pattern for state management.
